title: Real Face of Jesus DVD on Sale at the History Channel Shop
post:
I found this video that explains about the Video. From Good Morning America: they took the image to the streets to find out what people thought about it. Maybe you’ve seen this already, but I’ll post it anyway. It’s kinda fun to watch:
